column1: Notes:  Local government data are estimates subject to variability.
a/Total full-time equivalent employment  includes employment of States and all types of local governments including independent school districts and special districts,
which are not displayed separately. The "Local, Total" lines, which include these districts, will not sum to the "counties" and "Municipalities" lines.
b/ Justice system employment of indepdndent school districts and special school districts (primarily for special police).
